lead_paragraph: Newly unsealed documents cast doubt on the Treasury’s justification for sweeping the mortgage giants’ profits, exposing the perils of letting the government act in secret.

headline.print_headline: The Secrets of a Bailout With No Exit
headline.main: Fannie, Freddie and the Secrets of a Bailout With No Exit

snippet: Newly unsealed documents cast doubt on the Treasury’s justification for sweeping the mortgage giants’ profits, exposing the perils of letting the government act in secret.
abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column notes recently released documents imply White House and Treasury Dept worked to stop Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac from reforming as independent entities following 2008 government bailout of financial system; evidence may help investors who are suing government for keeping all profits generated by government-sponsored mortgage enterprises.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
